msg.msgText: The singleton configuration objects that control messaging services, such as LogLevel, ConnectionLog, SecurityLog etc., can be configured using the "set" option of the "imaserver" command. SYNTAX: imaserver set help imaserver set object help imaserver set object=value EXAMPLES: imaserver set LogLevel help imaserver set LogLevel=NORMAL

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
